Package org.talend.sdk.component.api.record

Interface Record.Builder

Enclosing interface:
Record
public static interface Record.Builder
Allows to create a record with a fluent API. This is the unique recommended way to create a record.

      default Record.Builder before(String entryName)
      Mark that next entry created withXXXX() will be before entryName in schema order.
      Parameters:
      entryName - target entry name. This entry must exist!
      Returns:
      this Builder
      See Also:
        • Schema#naturalOrder()
